Name: Name
AboutLocalization: The application supports localization with two languages: English and Georgian.
AboutApp: This application is designed to manage files efficiently, offering a range of functionalities to enhance your file handling experience.
AboutTech: This application is built using a variety of modern technologies to ensure efficiency and ease of use:
AboutDownload: Allows downloading files either as a single file or as a folder in zipped format.
AboutPreview: Enables previewing image, audio, or video files on the website without the need to download them. Video and audio files can be seeked forward or backward for convenient viewing and listening.
AboutCreateFolder: Enables the creation of new folders.
AboutDelete: Provides the option to delete folder/file.
AboutAuthorization: Authorization is facilitated through HttpOnly Cookie. For simplicity, the API implementation of authentication code is kept minimal. A database is not used in this scenario.
